page.title: 03THE RIVER TARRANT(CONT.)
page.content: WE SAW A WATER RAT SWIMMING AND SCURRYING ALONG THE BANK.IT WAS ABOUT 20 CM.LONG.WE SAW A MOORHEN WITH TWO CHICKS,AND A HORSEFLY WHICH WAS FEEDING IN SOME RUSHES. WE SAW A FLOCK OF WILD DUCKS FLYING AWAY FROM US BECAUSE WE DISTURBED THEM. SOME OF US SAW A DRAGONFLY. IT SWOOPED DOWN AND JUST MISSED DARRELL'S HAND AND THEN IT FLEW OFF. MOST OF US GOT VERY WET. THE WATER CAME OVER THE TOP OF OUR WELLINGTON BOOTS - 'IT WAS VERY SQUELCHY AND COLD WHEN THE WATER GOT INTO MY BOOTS'. 'IT WAS COLD AND DEEP'.'IT WAS ALL SQUELCHY AND WET AND SOGGY'.'THE WATER WAS WARMISH. IT WAS DEEP AND I WAS THE FIRST ONE TO GET WATER IN MY BOOTS'. 'IT WAS FREEZING COLD.I GOT A LOT OF IT IN MY BOOTS. IT WAS VERY UNCOMFORTABLE'. 'I HAD GREAT FUN'.
